docs.snippet: ARESTY--David R.,56, on October 23rd, 2013. David was a loving husband, father, and Vice President of Distribution at Alfred Dunner, Inc. He survived a bone marrow transplant in 1989 and a liver transplant in 2012. Through strength, determination,...
docs.lead_paragraph: ARESTY--David R.,56, on October 23rd, 2013. David was a loving husband, father, and Vice President of Distribution at Alfred Dunner, Inc. He survived a bone marrow transplant in 1989 and a liver transplant in 2012. Through strength, determination, and courage, he lived a full and beautiful life. He will be remembered for his love of Alabama football, family, and fast cars. He will be missed by Patti, Adam, Holly, Rachel, Danny, Benjamin and the family dogs Mandy, Marcy, Ace, and Olivia, as well as his extended family at Alfred Dunner and the community. His family is extremely grateful to Dr. Steven Papish of Morristown Medical Center, Dr. Jim Armitage and Dr. Phil Bierman of the University of Nebraska Medical Center, Dr. Michael F. Sorrell, Dr. Wendy Grant, and the entire transplant team at UNMC who gave him the gift of life. Funeral services will be held at 11am on Monday at Temple B'nai Or, 60 Overlook Rd. in Morristown, New Jersey. In lieu of flowers, please send donations to the University of Nebraska Foundation c/o the David and Patti Aresty Fund, attn. Amy Volk 2285 S. 67th Street, Suite 200, Omaha NE, 68106. Services by Bernheim, Apter & Kreitzman Funeral Home of Livingston, NJ.

docs.snippet: The musician Jack White has helped lead a project that resulted in a huge boxed set of music from Paramount Records....
docs.lead_paragraph: The musician Jack White has helped lead a project that resulted in a huge boxed set of music from Paramount Records.
docs.abstract: Deluxe boxed set The Rise and Fall of Paramount Records, which contains books, vinyl records and hundreds of music tracks in MP3 format, is among many reissue projects that make obscure music from early days of recording available to listeners.
